Title: Young Researchers Reception
Abstract: The Young Researchers Reception is for ICTD scholars who are in the early stages of their research (age no bar). This may include students (Undergraduate, Masters, Ph.D.) as well as industry professionals who have recently started pursuing research in the field of ICTD. The reception will not include formal research presentations, but we do plan to have some fun ice-breaking sessions and look forward to your participation in the same.
